Function reference

Load an ADAT

Load RFU (feature) data loaded into (and out of) an R session.

read_adat() read.adat() is.soma_adat()
Read (Load) SomaLogic ADATs
write_adat()
Write an ADAT to File
print(<soma_adat>) summary(<soma_adat>) `[`(<soma_adat>) `$`(<soma_adat>) `[[`(<soma_adat>) `[<-`(<soma_adat>) `$<-`(<soma_adat>) `[[<-`(<soma_adat>) median(<soma_adat>)
The soma_adat Class and S3 Methods
loadAdatsAsList() collapseAdats()
Load ADAT files as a list
parseHeader()
SomaLogic ADAT parser
rn2col() col2rn() has_rn() rm_rn() set_rn() add_rowid()
Helpers for Working With Row Names
Col.Meta colmeta annotations rowmeta
Analyte Annotations, Col.Meta, and Row Info
is_intact_attr() is.intact.attributes()
Are Attributes Intact?
Math(<soma_adat>) antilog() Ops(<soma_adat>) Summary(<soma_adat>) `==`(<soma_adat>)
Group Generics for soma_adat Class Objects
reexports count rename slice_sample slice sample_frac sample_n filter mutate arrange group_by ungroup left_join anti_join full_join inner_join semi_join right_join unite separate
Objects exported from other packages

ADAT Manipulation

Functions that allow filtering, wrangling, and subset selection of ADAT objects.

getSeqId() regexSeqId() locateSeqId() seqid2apt() apt2seqid() is.apt() is.SeqId() matchSeqIds() getSeqIdMatches()
Working with SomaLogic SeqIds
is_seqFormat()
Test AptName Format
getAnalyteInfo() getTargetNames() getFeatureData()
Get Analyte Annotation Information
getAnalytes() getMeta() getFeatures()
Get Analytes
diffAdats()
Diff Two ADAT Objects

Transform Between SomaScan Versions

Functionality required to convert between SomaScan versions, e.g. v4.1 -> v4.0, sometimes referred to as “lifting”.

read_annotations()
Import a SomaLogic Annotations File
lift_adat()
Lift an ADAT Between Assay Versions
transform(<soma_adat>)
Scale Transform soma_adat Columns/Rows

Expression Data

Functions to convert objects to those familiar with expression data.

adat2eSet()
Convert ADAT to ExpressionSet Object
pivotExpressionSet()
Convert to Long Format

Helpers

Accessor functions to add, modify, or retreive attribute information. Typically used internally but are exported for user convenience.

addAttributes()
Add Attributes to soma_adat Objects
addClass()
Add a Class to an Object
cleanNames()
Clean Up Character String
getAdatVersion()
Get ADAT Version

Data Objects

Objects provided with SomaDataIO.

SomaScanObjects example_data ex_analytes ex_anno_tbl ex_target_names
Example Data and Objects

Deprecated

Functions that have been deprecated (sunset) in the current SomaDataIO release.

SomaDataIO-deprecated meltExpressionSet getSomamers getSomamerData
Deprecated function(s) of the SomaDataIO package
